img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a player character is engaged in combat with a glowing, humanoid enemy. The enemy appears to be wielding a weapon and is surrounded by a blue aura. The game interface shows various icons and meters, including a health bar at the bottom of the screen and a resource labeled "Will" with a quantity of 129 on the right side. The environment is dark and rocky, suggesting an underground or cavernous setting.
